name: Doomies: Reloaded
description:
Doomies: Reloaded is an intense, super gory game about killing mutant animals and overcoming your previous hi-score!

Featuring:

  •  4 unlockable arenas
  •  3 different player skins
  •  Trophies
  •  2 different enemies
  •  4 distinct weapons
  •  Screenshake and juicy effects
  •  Blood splatter effects
  •  Great gameplay
  •  And parry when you go REALLY fast

In a nutshell... It's an arcade game like the old ones!
